title: What can you do with a Sociology qualification with Dr Wendy Podd
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr Wendy Podd about the benefits of a Sociology degree. Wendy  discusses some examples of famous people who have studied Sociology and then explains findings from her research on Sociology graduates in terms of what they are doing now and how they use their Sociology qualification in their current employment.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
